name: PRETZEL
description:
PRETZEL is a little arcade game featuring blaring colours, silly motion blur, and big flashy numbers!

Move your little cube-dude around with WASD.

Use the numpad (yeah the thing on the right hand side of your keyboard!) numbers 123,4,6,789 to raise and lower shields around the cubey dude.

Don't hit the wrong keys (5,0) or it gets harder :D

Have fun pretzeling!

(unfortunately this game does require a numpad so I am sorry to people with little laptops that may not have one :/)

The music consists of clips from:

Mystery Mammal - Wonders of modern technology.

(CC 4.0, attribution)

*Go check out his stuff, it's pretty groovy*

NOTE: A mac build is coming as soon as I can update unity to 5.5
